name: Blue's Clues: Lights On, Lights Off
name_original: Blue's Clues: Lights On, Lights Off
description:
The game starts with toys scattered all over the room. Take a good look at the toys on the floor and then turn off the light by clicking on the lamp. Click on the lamp again to turn the lights back on and figure out which toy Blue put in the toy box.
You'll know when you get it right because the toy will jump up and down and Blue will do her dance!
